description: Automatically formats Python code to conform to the PEP 8 style guide.
usage: autopep8 [-h] [--version] [-v] [-d] [-i] [--global-config filename] [--ignore-local-config] [-r] [-j n] [-p n] [-a] [--experimental] [--exclude globs] [--list-fixes] [--ignore errors] [--select errors] [--max-line-length n] [--line-range line line] [--hang-closing] [--exit-code] [files ...]

-h.description: show this help message and exit

--version.description: show program's version number and exit

-v.description: print verbose messages; multiple -v result in more verbose messages

-d.description: print the diff for the fixed source

-i.description: make changes to files in place

--global-config.description: path to a global pep8 config file; if this file does not exist then this is ignored (default: /home/trahloc/.config/pep8)

--ignore-local-config.description: don't look for and apply local config files; if not passed, defaults are updated with any config files in the project's root directory

-r.description: run recursively over directories; must be used with --in-place or --diff

-j.description: number of parallel jobs; match CPU count if value is less than 1

-p.description: maximum number of additional pep8 passes (default: infinite)

-a.description: enable non-whitespace changes; multiple -a result in more aggressive changes

--exclude.description: exclude file/directory names that match these comma-separated globs

--list-fixes.description: list codes for fixes; used by --ignore and --select

--ignore.description: do not fix these errors/warnings (default: E226,E24,W50,W690)

--line-range.description: only fix errors found within this inclusive range of line numbers (e.g. 1 99); line numbers are indexed at 1

--exit-code.description: change to behavior of exit code. default behavior of return value, 0 is no differences, 1 is error exit. return 2 when add this option. 2 is exists differences.

files.name: files
files.description: files to format or '-' for standard in
